Html:
Hi Guys,
we try to deploy java 7u25 (32Bit) to our windows 7 64Bit.
I recieve follow error on the client without administration right: Code 653 Unbekannter Fehler bei Windows Update.

Here the windowsupdate.log:
https://cloud.wurzach-it.de/owncloud/public.php?service=files&t=5c6f8e8d1b2c7e6fb18655cf6a5d1313

Packet configuration:
https://cloud.wurzach-it.de/owncloud/public.php?service=files&t=e5efa52e6285af3e54d1d3aa92b80404

After that i configure additional in the packet "Can request User Input".
If i try to install the update, it prompt the UAC.


Regards,
Daniel

Hi,

I can't read your Windows Update log.

If you check the option "Can request User Input", then the installation will run with the user credential. And, as your user doesn't have admin privileges... :-(

You have to click upper right Corner "download". ;)
The log says: Installation Failure: Windows failed to install the following update with error 0x80070643: Java 7 Update 25 EXE.

Regards
Norbert

I use now the msi files from 7u45 and this work's.
I close the thread.
